scripts.build:scss: sass src/scss/style.scss | postcss --use autoprefixer cssnano -o dist/css/style.min.css --source-map
scripts.watch:scss: nodemon --config nodemon.json -e scss -x "npm run build:scss && npm run cache:bust"
scripts.watch:js: nodemon --config nodemon.json -e js -x "npm run minify:js && npm run cache:bust"
